creator: Xayn AG
descriptionHtml:
Say hello to Xayn – your personalised & private news assistant.
Xayn News Assistant searches for interesting news & articles from the internet and curates them for you in a continuous, personalised feed while keeping your data private.

Try it now and get free unlimited access!

Discover your personalised news assistant
Xayn News Assistant gives you personalised content recommendations in an endless feed. Xayn’s AI searches for interesting articles from the internet and delivers them directly into your very own stream. Based on your interests and likes or dislikes, you can discover and stay up to date with the news, as well as always get the latest articles and blogs of your interest. No more searching around endless websites and news outlets. Xayn gives you everything in a personalised stream.

Privacy is the fundament of everything we do
To protect your privacy, we have built a privacy search engine. Our powerful AI personalises the content stream directly on your device. As it sits directly on your device, not only does it ensure your privacy, but it helps you discover news, blogs and articles solely based on what you like, not based on other people's interests. We also automatically block personalised ads, external trackers and cookies – so third parties can no longer track you on the internet when you use our app*. This is how you stay private while searching the web for great content that you like.

Without Ads for better news experience
No one likes ads. They’re distracting, manipulative and data leeches. That’s why we’ve made our product completely ad-free. For a cleaner content experience for you. While you enjoy our personalised feed, you will find that there are no ads in between, and no ad banners on the side when you use our app.*

Green is good
While we’re certified carbon neutral, we believe that emissions reduction is better. That’s why we built our AI to be 94.5% more energy-efficient than Google’s BERT model.

Download now Xayn News Assistant – your assistant to get personalised & private news from the web.

We believe all information should be free, and we don’t charge you for the content. We introduced in-app purchases to support the development and service of our news assistant. We want to reward you by giving our early birds free access!

Links:
Learn all about the company behind Xayn here: www.xayn.com/company/who-we-are

We recommend you make it a habit of always reading the privacy policies. Here's ours in a nutshell: a no tracking policy. This is the only way how you can truly stay private. http://beta.xayn.com/privacy-policy

You can find our terms & conditions here: http://beta.xayn.com/terms-of-use

We believe in transparency in technology, because an open web is a better web. Find our source code here: www.github.com/xaynetwork

Social:
For all the latest news and updates on Xayn, we invite you to follow us on social media:
Twitter: @XaynHQ
LinkedIn: @Xayn
Instagram: @xaynhq

We don’t just help you discover the news, blogs and articles; we also make them: Learn who is talking about us in the press: www.xayn.com/company/press


*Once you open articles outside of our app in your standard browser, please note that we cannot block ads and third-party tracking. Please check our Privacy Policy for more info http://beta.xayn.com/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Explore personalised news & articles without ads while keeping your data private

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Everything is new! Say hello to Xayn's personalised & private news assistant!
- Try it now and get free unlimited access using the promo-code "Beta2022"
- Our news assistant searches for interesting news & articles from the internet and curates them for you in a continuous, personalised feed while keeping your data private.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Big news everyone: We are introducing Xayn Premium! Xayn is free to download and test for 7-days, after which you have the offer to subscribe for a small monthly fee. Cancelable anytime.
- If you used the News Assistant during the Beta Phase, don’t worry, you will be able to continue using the app for free.
- Make sure to check the tooltips to get the most out of your news assistant!
- Also, many bug fixes and performance improvements.
Happy discovering!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for being here! Here's what's new:

- We tackled major performance issues & many, many, many bugs
- Stay tuned, new exciting features are coming soon!

Have a great start into July!

title: Xayn Private News Assistant

creator: Xayn AG
descriptionHtml:
Say hello to Xayn – your personalized & private news assistant! Discover endless news without ads.

Xayn News Assistant searches for interesting news & articles from the internet and curates them for you in a continuous, personalized, ad-free feed while keeping your data private.

DISCOVER YOUR PERSONALIZED NEWS ASSISTANT
Xayn News Assistant gives you personalized content recommendations in an endless feed. Xayn’s AI searches for interesting articles from the internet and delivers them directly into your very own stream. Based on your interests and likes or dislikes, you can discover and stay up to date with the news, as well as always get the latest articles and blogs of your interest. No more searching around endless websites and news outlets. Xayn gives you everything in a personalized stream.

PRIVACY IS THE FUNDAMENT OF EVERYTHING WE DO
To protect your privacy, we have built a privacy search engine. Our powerful AI personalizes the content stream directly on your device. As it sits directly on your device, not only does it ensure your privacy, but it helps you discover news, blogs and articles solely based on what you like, not based on other people's interests. We also automatically block personalized ads, external trackers, and cookies – so third parties can no longer track you on the internet when you use our app*. This is how you stay private while searching the web for great content that you like.

WITHOUT ADS FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE
No one likes ads. They are distracting, manipulative and data leeches. That’s why we’ve made our product completely ad-free. For a cleaner content experience for you. While you enjoy our personalized feed, you will find that there are no ads in between, and no ad banners on the side when you use our app.*

GREEN IS GOOD
While we're certified carbon neutral, we believe that emissions reduction is better. That is why we built our AI to be 94.5% more energy-efficient than Google's BERT model.

Download now Xayn News Assistant – your assistant to get personalized & private news from the web.

We believe all information should be free, and we don’t charge you for the content. We introduced in-app purchases to support the development and service of our news assistant. Please check our Content Policy for more info: https://www.xayn.com/content-policy

LINKS
Learn all about the company behind Xayn here: https://www.xayn.com/company
We recommend you make it a habit of always reading the privacy policies: https://www.xayn.com/privacy-policy
You can find our terms & conditions here: https://www.xayn.com/terms-of-use
We believe in transparency in technology because an open web is a better web. Find our source code here: www.github.com/xaynetwork

SOCIAL
For all the latest news and updates on Xayn, we invite you to follow us on social media:
Instagram: @xaynhq
LinkedIn: @xaynhq
Twitter: @xaynhq

We don’t just help you discover the news, blogs, and articles; we also make them: Learn who is talking about us in the press: https://www.xayn.com/company/press

*Once you open articles outside of our app in your standard browser, please note that we cannot block ads and third-party tracking. Please check our Privacy Policy for more info https://www.xayn.com/privacy-policy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Great news: we prolonged our free trial period! Xayn is free to download and test for 28-days, after which you have the offer to subscribe for a small monthly fee. Cancelable anytime.
We also fixed many bugs and worked on improving UI, overall performance, and AI performance.
Happy discovering!
